Uses of Package
core_components

  • Packages that use core_components 
    Package Description
    application_frames
    Contains the frames used to make up the interface of the entire application, including the main application frame, the Settings window, the Attribute Table window and other associated GUI frames.
    file_handling
    Contains the Classes used for the File Handling (Import / Export CSV) and the management of the database credentials in an external file
    renderers_and_editors
    Contains renderer objects that render the colored patch (GeometryTableIconRenderer) and the remove button (LayerRemoveButtonRenderer) for each layer instance in the table of contents.
    toolset
    Contains miscellaneous utilities used throughout the application.
  • Classes in core_components used by application_frames 
    Class Description
    DrawingJPanel
    Panel for drawing items.
    TableOfContents
    Arranges the list of current layers
    It can:
    Turn off and on layer
    Remove layer and
    Change the color of a layer.
    ToolIconButton
    Blue print for the tool buttons
    Uses background image and can change background dynamically
    Responds to mouse over and mouse exited by changing the background of the button
  • Classes in core_components used by file_handling 
    Class Description
    TableOfContents
    Arranges the list of current layers
    It can:
    Turn off and on layer
    Remove layer and
    Change the color of a layer.
  • Classes in core_components used by renderers_and_editors 
    Class Description
    GeometryIcon
    This class is an extension of the swing JPanel component.
  • Classes in core_components used by toolset 
    Class Description
    DrawingJPanel
    Panel for drawing items.
